author: dmeuser
body:
#### PR description:

In this PR the thresholds for the maximal movements used in the HG PCL alignment are updated in the corresponding config file to be in line with the thresholds used during data taking of Run 3.

#### PR validation:

The PR was validated by writing and reading the corresponding payload using `cmsRun AlignPCLThresholdsWriter_cfg.py` and `cmsRun AlignPCLThresholdsReader_cfg.py`.

@mmusich, @consuegs, @henriettepetersen
title: Update of HG PCL tracker alignment max movement thresholds
